Detailed Description

ECal sensitive detector that uses an EcalHexReadout to create the hits.

Member Function Documentation

G4ThreeVector ldmx::EcalSD::getHitPosition ( G4Step *  aStep  )  [private]

Return the hit position of a step. X and Y are computed from the midpoint of the step. Z corresponds to the volume's center.

Returns:
The hit position from the step.

Set initial hit position from midpoint of the step.

Use facet info of the solid for setting Z to the sensor midpoint.
